text: Secret Agent () is a 1947 Soviet spy movie directed by Boris Barnet.Овеянный легендой. О разведчике Николае Кузнецове, в подвиги которого трудно поверитьПодвиг разведчика It stars Pavel Kadochnikov, Amvrosy Buchma, and Viktor Dobrovolsky. ==Actors== *Pavel Kadochnikov as major Aleksei Fedotov *Amvrosy Buchma as Grigory Leschuk *Viktor Dobrovolsky as Chief *Dmitri Milyutenko as Berezhnoy *Sergey Martinson as Willi Pommer *Mikhail Romanov as Erich von Rummelsburg == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1947 movies Category:Soviet movies Category:Spy movies Category:Movies directed by Boris Barnet
title: Secret Agent (1947 movie)
